header.title: GRAPPLE Tutorial
header.description: This tutorial explains GRAPPLE, from setup to end-user learner, teacher and administrator. The tutorial itself refers to separate tutorials for different parts of GRAPPLE: the setup of a Learning Management System (LMS), the GRAPPLE event bus (GEB), the GRAPPLE user modeling framework (GUMF), the GRAPPLE authoring tool (GAT) and the GRAPPLE adaptive learning environment (GALE). GRAPPLE contains additional elements, for visualization, virtual reality and simulation, not covered by this tutorial (at this time).
